X

November 17 (Thursday)
08:30 AM

11:45 PM

 Liver Transplant Nursing HALL G
Moderators Azza Elsaid, MD (Ain Shams University, Egypt) – Eloisa Socorro, PhD (Saudi German Hospital Cairo, Egypt) – Salwa Hashhash (Cleveland Clinic, Abu Dhabi)
Target audience All healthcare professionals who provide care for per and post-transplant patients

Transplant Nurses, Transplant coordinators, administrators

Medical secretory and social workers aiming to widen their knowledge.

All members of the transplant team to guide and improve their clinical practice and patient management during all phases of transplantation

The nurses who is responsible for the care of liver transplant patients require special preparation to meet the patient’s needs during the critical phases of the liver transplant process
Objectives Referral, indication and contraindication for liver transplantation.

Liver transplant evaluation process.

Donor selection and acceptance.

Clarify ethical issues about transplantation

Post-operative complication and Rejection.

Post-transplant Medication.

Post-transplant Nutrition.

Post-transplant follows up care and family education.

Role of the transplant Coordinator.  .
About the workshop This workshop aims at enhancing the knowledge and provide a comprehensive overview of the liver transplant process, inpatient and post-transplant care.
Additional Instructions Please contact the organizer for registration.
08:30 AM

10:00 AM

 Session 1
08:30 AM

09:00 AM

 Overview and evaluation process.

Salwa Hashhash (Cleveland Clinic, Abu Dhabi)
09:00 AM

09:15 AM

 Nursing care for LTx patients in the ICU.

Azza Elsaid (Ain Shams University, Egypt)
09:15 AM

09:30 AM

 Post LTx inpatient nursing care.

Tharwat Ibrahim (Saudi German Hospital, Egypt)
09:30 AM

09:45 AM

 Post LTx nursing Discharge plan and follow-up

Abdelhameed Mahros (Saudi German Hospital, Egypt)
09:45 AM

10:00 AM

 Discussion
10:00 AM

10:15 AM

 Break
10:15 AM

11:45 AM

 Session 2
10:15 AM

10:30 AM

 Nursing code of ethics

Azza Elsaid (Ain Shams University, Egypt)
10:30 AM

10:45 AM

 Role of the transplant coordinator.

Salwa Hashhash (Cleveland Clinic, Abu Dhabi)
10:45 AM

11:00 AM

 Basic tips for clinical nutrition.

Sarah Alaa Osman (Ain Shams University, Egypt)
11:00 AM

11:15 AM

 Immunosuppressant: What you should know?

Mai Ali (NIH Liver Transplantation Unit, Egypt)
11:15 AM

11:30 AM

 Assessment of IPC a powerful tool to control HAI in LTx patients.

Jehan Fahmy (Ain Shams University, Egypt)
11:30 AM

11:45 AM

 Discussion.
